scripts.ci: pnpm run formatCheck && pnpm run lint && pnpm run testOnce && pnpm run build
scripts.createRelease: npx changeset add && npx changeset version && git add . && git commit -m 'chore(release): create a release [skip ci]' --no-verify
scripts.pushReleaseGit: git push origin main && git push origin --tags
scripts.release: npm run ci && npm run createRelease && npx changeset publish && npm run pushReleaseGit
